body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning             Planning       In this section, you will find documents and other planning materials related to: ·  Management of the Captain John Smith Chesapeake and Star-Spangled Banner national historic trails; ·  Public access planning to create recreational facilities; ·  Collaborative work to protect large landscapes; and, ·  Expansion of Chesapeake Youth Corps workforces engaging youth in outdoor recreation and service-learning projects.
title: Chesapeake Bay: Planning
